# üëë Vigilante Killing

The Vigilante can guess the role of a certain player during the meeting.

If it is correct, the target dies, and if it is wrong, the Vigilante dies.

The guessing command is /bt [player ID] [Role]

You can see the ID of player‚Äôs next to their name, or by typing /id

PS: You don‚Äôt need to worry about this if you have a TOHE Modded Client, as it includes a built-in Guesser GUI on Player Nameplates)

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Vigilantes that can be in a match
  • Maximum number of guesses
    • Set how many times Vigilantes can guess
  • Can Guess Crewmate Roles
    • ON: the Vigilante can guess Crewmates
    • OFF: the Vigilante cannot guess Crewmates
  • Can Guess Add-Ons
    • ON: the Vigilante can guess players Add-Ons
    • OFF: Vigilante cannot guess based off of Add-Ons
  • Try to hide guesser's command
    • ON: the mod will attempt to hide the Vigilante‚Äôs commands
    • OFF: the mod will not care to hide the Vigilante‚Äôs commands

From: idk & Coding: KARPED1EMopen in new window„ÄÅCommandf1open in new window
